document.full_text: pakistan and the united states reaffirmed their commitment on tuesday to fight islamist militancy on tuesday, a day after the killing of osama bin laden presented an opportunity to reconcile strained ties and find a solution to the afghan conflict.
document.title: pakistan, u.s. vow to fight terrorism after bin laden death
lines_and_colors: pakistan and the united states reaffirmed their commitment on tuesday to fight islamist militancy on tuesday, a day after the killing of osama bin laden presented an opportunity to reconcile strained ties and find a solution to the afghan conflict.
